g.id: Starting the OpenID for Verifiable Presentations flow
g.text: Starting the OpenID for Verifiable Presentations flow

g.id: Creating and sending the Authorization Response
g.text: Creating and sending the Authorization Response

g.id: Authenticating the user with the LEARCredential
g.text: Authenticating the user with the LEARCredential
(10) Verification of signature of Authorization Request
(11) Verification of the identity of the Relying Party
(12) Verification of the trusted nature of the RP
(15 and 16) Verify signature and issuer of LEARCredential
(17) Verify sender of the Authorization Response
(21) Refresh screen with services and include <access token>
